title: SC EP:82 100 Bigfoot Nights
itunes:title: SC EP:82 100 Bigfoot Nights
description: Tonight we speak to Christine Dela Parker, author of 100 Bigfoot Nights. Christine talks about moving into a home that was abandoned and in need of fixing up. She moved into the home and realized very quickly that something was not right. Listen in as she talks about the encounters around her property with Sasquatch and the Dogman. To learn more about Christine's book, visit the site at: www.100bigfootnights.com
